## About me

I am an Assistant Professor in Statistics at the [Department of Economics, Management and Statistics](https://www.dems.unimib.it/en) (DEMS) at [University of Milano-Bicocca](https://en.unimib.it).

**Research interests**: Compositional data analysis; Bayesian inference; Mixture models; Computational Statistics; Regression models for bounded responses; Latent topic models.

**E-mail**: roberto.ascari\@unimib.it
